short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a quick and distraction-free search experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SearchOnSite is a search-focused extension that offers a default search that is simple and fast.
The SearchOnSite extension sets your default search provider to Microsoft Bing.
By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the SearchOnSite extension, set the Chrome™ default search to SearchOnSite, and to the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://www.SearchOnSite.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://www.SearchOnSite.com/privacy-policy

For easy access, we recommend pinning the extension to your browser toolbar.
